_documentation.title: STTM Impact Analysis - Scoring Configuration
_documentation.description: This file controls how test cases are scored for impact when STTM changes occur

scoring._comment: Points awarded for different types of evidence that a test case is affected
scoring._tab_name_match_explanation: Points when test case mentions the changed STTM tab name
scoring._deleted_field_explanation: Points per deleted field (high impact - deleted fields usually break tests)
scoring._modified_field_explanation: Points per modified field (medium impact - field changed but still exists)
scoring._added_field_explanation: Points per added field (low impact - new fields rarely break existing tests)
scoring._exact_tab_match_explanation: Bonus points when test mentions the complete STTM tab name
scoring._partial_tab_match_explanation: Points when test mentions some keywords from STTM tab name
scoring._field_name_match_explanation: Points for each field name mentioned in test case content
scoring._sample_data_match_explanation: Points when test mentions specific sample data values that changed
scoring._thresholds_comment: Point thresholds that determine final impact level
scoring._case_sensitive_explanation: false = 'VendorID' matches 'vendorid' | true = exact case required
scoring._minimum_keyword_explanation: Ignore short words when matching (e.g., ignore 'ID' but match 'Vendor')

_log_level_explanation: INFO=normal output | DEBUG=detailed matching info | WARNING=errors only
_output_directory_explanation: Where to save impact analysis reports
